trans-unit.source: Whenever you cycle Astral Drift or cycle another card while Astral Drift is on the battlefield, you may exile target creature. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: Whenever you cycle Astral Drift or cycle another card while Astral Drift is on the battlefield, you may exile target creature. trans-unit.resname: PMH1路1p | Morophon, the Boundless | Card Name
PMH1路1p | Morophon, the Boundless | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) As Morophon, the Boundless enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Spells of the chosen type you cast cost {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay. Other creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) As Morophon, the Boundless enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Spells of the chosen type you cast cost {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay. Other creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.
